nodes.label: Draw reversible and irreversible changes (ice melting vs. egg cooking)
Ice cube with sharp edges and blue puddle of water with reversible arrow labeled 'melting'
Raw egg with yolk and white next to a cooked egg with shading, crossed out with a red 'X'
Understands ice melting and refreezing is reversible
Misunderstands irreversibility of egg cooking with 'X' marking
Use clear labels/themes for irreversible processes like cooking
